ferrn 0.0.1

A ggproto for drawing interpolation path

Source: R/draw.R
add_interp.Rd

This is a wrapper function used by explore_space_pca() and should be be called directly by the user

add_interp(
  dt,
  interp_size = 1.5,
  interp_alpha = NULL,
  interp_color = NULL,
  interp_group = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

dt

A data object from the running the optimisation algorithm in guided tour
interp_size

the size of the path
interp_alpha

an alpha value for the transparency of the path
interp_color

the colour of the path
interp_group

a group variable for path connection
...

other aesthetics inherent from explore_space_pca()

See also

Other draw functions: add_anchor(), add_anno(), add_dir_search(), add_end(), add_interp_last(), add_interrupt(), add_search(), add_space(), add_start(), add_theo()

Contents

  • Arguments
